data.title: Caregiver Documentary Film
data.meta_description: Many parent caregivers for disabled children and adults are struggling. The UNSEEN documentary film is about how we're failing caregivers and why it matters.
data.text:
Creating Caregiver-Friendly Workplaces

1 in 5 working Americans are caregivers.

It’s time to rethink how we support caregivers in the workplace to improve their overall well being and productivity. Explore our practical guides for employers and resources for caregivers and advocates to start building a more caregiver-friendly workplace.

Explore Toolkit

Aidaly provides family caregivers with the training, support, and compensation they need to deliver high-quality care in the home.

With a combination of technology & human support, Aidaly’s platform empowers families to keep their loved ones living in their homes and communities longer while filling a critical homecare workforce need.

LEARN MORE ABOUT AIDALY

Homethrive is transforming the way we care, making it smarter, easier, and more rewarding for everyone.

Whether caring for a loved one due to age, disability, or a medical condition, our intuitive online platform provides personalized advice and expert assistance, however and whenever it’s needed. We help caregivers discover a better way forward that prioritizes their loved one’s care and their own wellbeing, so they can thrive at home and at work.

LEARN MORE

Carewell is the one-stop-shop for all of your caregiver needs.

With knowledgeable care specialists available 24/7 and great prices on thousands of quality products, Carewell focuses on helping caregivers so you can focus on your loved ones. Shop today and get fast, free shipping.

Learn More

Earn like a boss.

Uber allows drivers flexibility to choose when and how they work, so they can be with their kids and family whenever they need — whether to drop kids off at school or take parents to an appointment. Controlling your schedule allows time for what is important.

LEARN MORE
